name: testcase-generator-agent
description: AI-powered test case generator agent with Supervisor protocol compliance.

scripts.test:health: curl -s http://localhost:3000/health | node -e "const d=require('fs').readFileSync(0,'utf8');console.log(JSON.parse(d).status==='I\'m up'?'✅ Agent is healthy':'❌ Agent is down')"

author: Muhammad Ali
